description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Team up with friends (via XBOX Live, system link, or a different controller on the same XBOX360) or embark on a solo quest to save the land from an evil wizard.  To bring peace to the world, you'll have to become a master of magic by harnessing the four elements: earth, water, wind, and fire.  Each magic spell possesses a different tradeoff and imparts a unique strategic advantage in combat.
description.short: Team up with friends (via XBOX Live, system link, or a different controller on the same XBOX360) or embark on a solo quest to save the land from an evil wizard.  To bring peace to the world, you'll have to become a master of magic by harnessing the four elements: earth, water, wind, and fire.  Each magic spell possesses a different tradeoff and imparts a unique strategic advantage in combat.
